name: Resist Energy, Communal
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook. © 2009, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: This spell functions like resist energy, except you divide the duration in 10-minute intervals among the creatures touched.
text_zh: 这个法术的工作方式如同抵抗能量伤害 (resist energy)，不过你可以将持续时间以10分钟为单位分配给接触到的复数生物。
